text: The New Relative () is a 1934 Hungarian comedy film directed by Béla Gaál. ==Cast== * Zita Perczel as Kitty (as Perczel Zitta) * Ferenc Delly as Esztáry Miklós * Gyula Gózon as Esztáry Sándor * Lili Berky as Tóni néni, Esztáry felesége (as Berky Lilly) * Ella Gombaszögi as Emma néni * Gyula Kabos as Sámson fõpincér * Ida Turay as Málcsi (as Turai Ida) * Sándor Pethes as Bernáth István * Attila Petheö as Ujváry (as Pethõ Attila) * Erzsi Ákos as Ujváry Irén * Klári Tolnay as Kenyereslány ==References== ==External links== * Category:1934 films Category:1934 comedy films Category:Hungarian films Category:Hungarian comedy films Category:Hungarian-language films Category:Hungarian black-and-white films
title: The New Relative
